# StreamExtensions.TrySaveAsZip method

Returns a value indicating whether zip compressed file has been created.

```csharp
public static IResult TrySaveAsZip(this Stream target, string streamExtension, string outputPath)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | Target to compress. |
| streamExtension | The stream extension. |
| outputPath | The output path. |

## Return Value

Operation result.
